page.title: 16A SCHOOL DAY IN CARLISLE
page.content: I get all my school stuff together and leave the house at 8.35.It takes about five minutes to walk to school where I have a game of soccer.J8 take on J6.We usually lose.At 9 o'clock we go into school.We take register.Then I get on with my spelling workshop.Today after assembly we measured around the school.Then we had to condense a piece of work we had written on 'A Typical Family Sunday'.I had to turn 257 words into 150 words.At dinnertime I walked home with Jonathan and Michael.For dinner I had cold beef.I watched cricket before going back to school. We played 'Buzz off' until quarter past one,when we went back into school.To start off with we read quietly for about ten minutes.Then we practised the singing for our 'Harold and William' play.
